attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition for all those who are FOR the West London Tram, that will run down the Uxbridge Road from Uxbridge to Shepherds Bush. 

To make this a valid debate, all those AGAINST the West London Tram can sign my other petition entitled (( AGAINST-Tram )). Both petitions will run consecutively for 2 months.
